title: China stocks crash 8% in hours — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
description:
Bitcoin price circles $43,000 as Chinese stocks are halted for volatility in a wild start to the macro week.

Bitcoin (BTC) begins its first full week of February with an escape from a breakdown below $42,000.

BTC price action remains in a sticky range — one which saw January gains capped at just 0.6%. What might be next for the market?

Still battling the low to mid-$40,000 area, Bitcoin bulls so far lack genuine momentum required to overcome sell pressure and challenge range highs.

Read more

title: Merlin Chain Secures Funding to Empower “Bitcoin-native” Innovations

title: Apple to Acquire German AI Startup Brighter AI to Enhance Privacy in Vision Pro
description: In a strategic move aimed at bolstering its commitment to user privacy, tech giant Apple is reportedly set to acquire Brighter AI, a German-based AI startup renowned for its groundbreaking data anonymization techniques. Brighter AI’s innovative technology specializes in effectively anonymizing personal data, including faces and license plates in images, without the need for blurring. […]
